content.raw:
Seems like the default CI and the pr-any use different versions of ignition packages. Here's the diff for the cmake configure

```
--- ci-default-consoleText.txt	2019-04-16 21:32:22.312203395 -0500
+++ ci-pr_any-consoleText.txt	2019-04-16 21:32:20.188175937 -0500
@@ -1,9 +1,9 @@
 + echo '# BEGIN SECTION: configure'
 # BEGIN SECTION: configure
-+ cd /var/lib/jenkins/workspace/ignition_gazebo-ci-default-bionic-amd64
-+ [[ ! -d /var/lib/jenkins/workspace/ignition_gazebo-ci-default-bionic-amd64/build ]]
-+ cd /var/lib/jenkins/workspace/ignition_gazebo-ci-default-bionic-amd64/build
-+ cmake /var/lib/jenkins/workspace/ignition_gazebo-ci-default-bionic-amd64/ign-gazebo -DCMAKE_INSTALL_PREFIX=/usr
++ cd /var/lib/jenkins/workspace/ignition_gazebo-ci-pr_any-ubuntu_auto-amd64
++ [[ ! -d /var/lib/jenkins/workspace/ignition_gazebo-ci-pr_any-ubuntu_auto-amd64/build ]]
++ cd /var/lib/jenkins/workspace/ignition_gazebo-ci-pr_any-ubuntu_auto-amd64/build
++ cmake /var/lib/jenkins/workspace/ignition_gazebo-ci-pr_any-ubuntu_auto-amd64/ign-gazebo -DCMAKE_INSTALL_PREFIX=/usr
 -- The C compiler identification is GNU 8.2.0
 -- The CXX compiler identification is GNU 8.2.0
 -- Check for working C compiler: /usr/lib/ccache/cc
@@ -177,42 +177,52 @@
 -- Looking for ignition-physics1 -- found version 1.1.0~pre2
 -- Looking for ignition-physics1 - found
 
--- Looking for ignition-sensors2 -- found version 2.0.0
+-- Looking for ignition-sensors2 -- found version 2.0.0~pre1
 -- Searching for dependencies of ignition-sensors2
 -- Found Protobuf: /usr/lib/x86_64-linux-gnu/libprotobuf.so;-lpthread;-lpthread;-lpthread;-lpthread (found suitable version "3.0.0", minimum required is "3") 
 -- Looking for ignition-math6 -- found version 6.1.0
 -- Looking for ignition-common3 -- found version 3.0.0
--- Looking for ignition-transport6 -- found version 6.0.0
+-- Looking for ignition-transport7 -- found version 7.0.0~pre1
+-- Searching for dependencies of ignition-transport7
+-- Found Protobuf: /usr/lib/x86_64-linux-gnu/libprotobuf.so;-lpthread;-lpthread;-lpthread;-lpthread;-lpthread (found suitable version "3.0.0", minimum required is "3") 
+-- Config-file not installed for ZeroMQ -- checking for pkg-config
+-- Checking for module 'libzmq >= 4'
+--   Found libzmq , version 4.2.5
+-- Found ZeroMQ: TRUE (Required is at least version "4") 
+-- Looking for ignition-msgs4 -- found version 4.0.0~pre1
+-- Searching for dependencies of ignition-msgs4
+-- Found Protobuf: /usr/lib/x86_64-linux-gnu/libprotobuf.so;-lpthread;-lpthread;-lpthread;-lpthread;-lpthread;-lpthread (found suitable version "3.0.0", minimum required is "3") 
+-- Looking for ignition-math6 -- found version 6.1.0
 -- Looking for ignition-rendering2 -- found version 2.0.0
 -- Searching for dependencies of ignition-rendering2
 -- Looking for ignition-math6 -- found version 6.1.0
 -- Looking for ignition-common3 -- found version 3.0.0
 -- Looking for ignition-plugin1 -- found version 1.0.0
--- Looking for ignition-msgs3 -- found version 3.1.0
+-- Looking for ignition-msgs4 -- found version 4.0.0~pre1
 -- Looking for ignition-plugin1 -- found version 1.0.0
 -- Searching for <ignition-sensors2> component [rendering]
--- Looking for ignition-sensors2-rendering -- found version 2.0.0
+-- Looking for ignition-sensors2-rendering -- found version 2.0.0~pre1
 -- Searching for dependencies of ignition-sensors2-rendering
 -- Searching for <ignition-sensors2> component [altimeter]
--- Looking for ignition-sensors2-altimeter -- found version 2.0.0
+-- Looking for ignition-sensors2-altimeter -- found version 2.0.0~pre1
 -- Searching for dependencies of ignition-sensors2-altimeter
 -- Searching for <ignition-sensors2> component [camera]
--- Looking for ignition-sensors2-camera -- found version 2.0.0
+-- Looking for ignition-sensors2-camera -- found version 2.0.0~pre1
 -- Searching for dependencies of ignition-sensors2-camera
 -- Searching for <ignition-sensors2> component [gpu_lidar]
--- Looking for ignition-sensors2-gpu_lidar -- found version 2.0.0
+-- Looking for ignition-sensors2-gpu_lidar -- found version 2.0.0~pre1
 -- Searching for dependencies of ignition-sensors2-gpu_lidar
 -- Searching for <ignition-sensors2> component [imu]
--- Looking for ignition-sensors2-imu -- found version 2.0.0
+-- Looking for ignition-sensors2-imu -- found version 2.0.0~pre1
 -- Searching for dependencies of ignition-sensors2-imu
 -- Searching for <ignition-sensors2> component [logical_camera]
--- Looking for ignition-sensors2-logical_camera -- found version 2.0.0
+-- Looking for ignition-sensors2-logical_camera -- found version 2.0.0~pre1
 -- Searching for dependencies of ignition-sensors2-logical_camera
 -- Searching for <ignition-sensors2> component [magnetometer]
--- Looking for ignition-sensors2-magnetometer -- found version 2.0.0
+-- Looking for ignition-sensors2-magnetometer -- found version 2.0.0~pre1
 -- Searching for dependencies of ignition-sensors2-magnetometer
 -- Searching for <ignition-sensors2> component [depth_camera]
--- Looking for ignition-sensors2-depth_camera -- found version 2.0.0
+-- Looking for ignition-sensors2-depth_camera -- found version 2.0.0~pre1
 -- Searching for dependencies of ignition-sensors2-depth_camera
 -- Looking for ignition-sensors2 - found
 
@@ -221,7 +231,7 @@
 -- Looking for ignition-math6 -- found version 6.1.0
 -- Looking for ignition-math6 - found
 
--- Found Protobuf: /usr/lib/x86_64-linux-gnu/libprotobuf.so;-lpthread;-lpthread;-lpthread;-lpthread;-lpthread (found suitable version "3.0.0", minimum required is "3") 
+-- Found Protobuf: /usr/lib/x86_64-linux-gnu/libprotobuf.so;-lpthread;-lpthread;-lpthread;-lpthread;-lpthread;-lpthread;-lpthread (found suitable version "3.0.0", minimum required is "3") 
 -- Looking for Protobuf - found
 
 -- 
@@ -270,6 +280,6 @@
 -- Could NOT find Doxygen (missing: DOXYGEN_EXECUTABLE) 
 -- Configuring done
 -- Generating done
--- Build files have been written to: /var/lib/jenkins/workspace/ignition_gazebo-ci-default-bionic-amd64/build
+-- Build files have been written to: /var/lib/jenkins/workspace/ignition_gazebo-ci-pr_any-ubuntu_auto-amd64/build
 + echo '# END SECTION'
 # END SECTION

```

--- ci-default-consoleText.txt  2019-04-16 21:32:22.312203395 -0500
